name: part_001
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Song performance of a special medley for the 5th anniversary.
MC section where the members talk to the audience and discuss their 5-year history.

subtitles.original: We're ready to seize the day
subtitles.english: We're ready to seize the day

subtitles.original: Traversing the pathways
subtitles.english: Traversing the pathways

subtitles.original: Discovering highways to everywhere
subtitles.english: Discovering highways to everywhere

subtitles.original: Step by step (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Step by step (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: Gathering stories that we can share!
subtitles.english: Gathering stories that we can share!

subtitles.original: Get ready to lead the way
subtitles.english: Get ready to lead the way

subtitles.original: With each generation, a shining sensation,
subtitles.english: With each generation, a shining sensation,

subtitles.original: A dream unfurls
subtitles.english: A dream unfurls

subtitles.original: Let's make friends (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Let's make friends (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: Making a moment of history
subtitles.english: Making a moment of history

subtitles.original: Joyfully, follow me
subtitles.english: Joyfully, follow me

subtitles.original: We'll connect the world!
subtitles.english: We'll connect the world!

subtitles.original: They'll hear our song ringing out over hills and oceans
subtitles.english: They'll hear our song ringing out over hills and oceans

subtitles.original: Our legend grows and continues!
subtitles.english: Our legend grows and continues!

subtitles.original: We'll carry on starting now, setting hearts in motion
subtitles.english: We'll carry on starting now, setting hearts in motion

subtitles.original: Connecting all of the world!
subtitles.english: Connecting all of the world!

subtitles.original: We're making our way to the next dimension
subtitles.english: We're making our way to the next dimension

subtitles.original: We're living out the dreams we believe in
subtitles.english: We're living out the dreams we believe in

subtitles.original: Excitement beyond our comprehension
subtitles.english: Excitement beyond our comprehension

subtitles.original: There's no question we'll break through!
subtitles.english: There's no question we'll break through!

subtitles.original: Don't retreat! We'll keep aspiring to excel
subtitles.english: Don't retreat! We'll keep aspiring to excel

subtitles.original: That's our Myth! It's awe-inspiring going well
subtitles.english: That's our Myth! It's awe-inspiring going well

subtitles.original: Represent! So light the fire and let's rebel
subtitles.english: Represent! So light the fire and let's rebel

subtitles.original: The future's brighter, we can tell!
subtitles.english: The future's brighter, we can tell!

subtitles.original: We're ready to...
subtitles.english: We're ready to...

subtitles.original: We're ready to change the world!
subtitles.english: We're ready to change the world!

subtitles.original: Medley, medley, medley, medley, medley!
subtitles.english: Medley, medley, medley, medley, medley!

subtitles.original: What are you doing?
subtitles.english: What are you doing?

subtitles.original: Oh you too? Both of you guys are acting a little strange.
subtitles.english: Oh you too? Both of you guys are acting a little strange.

subtitles.original: We're doing crazy poses!
subtitles.english: We're doing crazy poses!

subtitles.original: Why are they being so silly?
subtitles.english: Why are they being so silly?

subtitles.original: We got a show to do!
subtitles.english: We got a show to do!

subtitles.original: You guys have a show to do!
subtitles.english: You guys have a show to do!

subtitles.original: Ina, come on, come on!
subtitles.english: Ina, come on, come on!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Go for it!

subtitles.original: I know the floor is nice, but...
subtitles.english: I know the floor is nice, but...

subtitles.original: It is really nice!
subtitles.english: It is really nice!

subtitles.original: It's smooth!
subtitles.english: It's smooth!

subtitles.original: Minna-san, thank you for coming to the show today to celebrate Myth's...
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for coming to the show today to celebrate Myth's...

subtitles.original: ...you guessed it, fifth anniversary!
subtitles.english: ...you guessed it, fifth anniversary!

subtitles.original: That was the medley, a nice throwback. We've made so many songs together.
subtitles.english: That was the medley, a nice throwback. We've made so many songs together.

subtitles.original: Nostalgic!
subtitles.english: Nostalgic!

subtitles.original: Putting it all together like that is like really emotional.
subtitles.english: Putting it all together like that is like really emotional.

subtitles.original: And it's not just like our fifth anniversary, it's also hololive English as a whole, five years!
subtitles.english: And it's not just like our fifth anniversary, it's also hololive English as a whole, five years!

subtitles.original: We're so old!
subtitles.english: We're so old!

subtitles.original: Senior!
subtitles.english: Senior!

subtitles.original: We're all yippee!
subtitles.english: We're all yippee!

subtitles.original: We're oldies, we also achieved so much in the last five years, you know?
subtitles.english: We're oldies, we also achieved so much in the last five years, you know?

subtitles.original: We had three EN concerts.
subtitles.english: We had three EN concerts.

subtitles.original: My voice cracked, sorry about that!
subtitles.english: My voice cracked, sorry about that!

subtitles.original: And we had a lot of friends join us over the years.
subtitles.english: And we had a lot of friends join us over the years.

subtitles.original: And this, you know, in the end I'm just really happy to be performing with you guys. It's so much fun!
subtitles.english: And this, you know, in the end I'm just really happy to be performing with you guys. It's so much fun!

subtitles.original: We can't get too emotional just yet, though, because we have a show to do!
subtitles.english: We can't get too emotional just yet, though, because we have a show to do!

subtitles.original: Anyways, anyways, anyways, there's a hashtag right here, right here!
subtitles.english: Anyways, anyways, anyways, there's a hashtag right here, right here!

subtitles.original: Take lots of pictures, screenshots and post them on social media. #Myth5years!
subtitles.english: Take lots of pictures, screenshots and post them on social media. #Myth5years!

subtitles.original: Make us trend!
subtitles.english: Make us trend!

subtitles.original: If you want, you don't have to if you don't want to.
subtitles.english: If you want, you don't have to if you don't want to.

subtitles.original: If you don't do it we'll be sad. We'll be angry.
subtitles.english: If you don't do it we'll be sad. We'll be angry.

subtitles.original: We'll get you!
subtitles.english: We'll get you!

subtitles.original: Also, besides that, everybody, this is important!
subtitles.english: Also, besides that, everybody, this is important!

subtitles.original: I'm just checking...
subtitles.english: I'm just checking...

subtitles.original: ...making sure you guys are all here legally.
subtitles.english: ...making sure you guys are all here legally.

subtitles.original: Did you guys all receive a ticket-sama? Hmm?
subtitles.english: Did you guys all receive a ticket? Hmm?

subtitles.original: Ah, it's me! It's me! That's me!
subtitles.english: Ah, it's me! It's me! That's me!

subtitles.original: We look so cool!
subtitles.english: We look so cool!

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think I gave you mine at the bar. It was kind of spicy, remember?
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think I gave you mine at the bar. It was kind of spicy, remember?

subtitles.original: I... I accosted you on the street, if you remember correctly.
subtitles.english: I... I accosted you on the street, if you remember correctly.

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh! That's what you're up to.
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh! That's what you're up to.

subtitles.original: I... I... I might have trespassed.
subtitles.english: I... I... I might have trespassed.

subtitles.original: Ina wouldn't do such a thing!
subtitles.english: Ina wouldn't do such a thing!

subtitles.original: Well... my Ninomae Ina'nis...
subtitles.english: Well... my Ninomae Ina'nis...

subtitles.original: Nothing! I did nothing illegal!
subtitles.english: Nothing! I did nothing illegal!

subtitles.original: Fine, don't tell me, keep your secrets. It's fine. I'm used to it in five years.
subtitles.english: Fine, don't tell me, keep your secrets. It's fine. I'm used to it in five years.

subtitles.original: Now that we know that everybody's here with their tickets and they're allowed to be here...
subtitles.english: Now that we know that everybody's here with their tickets and they're allowed to be here...

subtitles.original: ...we'll be singing a lot on this stage today in different combinations and different fun songs and so on.
subtitles.english: ...we'll be singing a lot on this stage today in different combinations and different fun songs and so on.

subtitles.original: Floor!
subtitles.english: Floor!

subtitles.original: Okay! Beautiful stage!
subtitles.english: Okay! Beautiful stage!

subtitles.original: お洒落！
subtitles.english: Stylish!

subtitles.original: Fancy!
subtitles.english: Fancy!

subtitles.original: There's a chair! Test it out, test it out!
subtitles.english: There's a chair! Test it out, test it out!

subtitles.original: How much does that cost?
subtitles.english: How much does that cost?

subtitles.original: Couch! Can I lie on it?
subtitles.english: Couch! Can I lie on it?

subtitles.original: Oh my god! The chandelier!
subtitles.english: Oh my god! The chandelier!
